page.title: 03LEISURE ACTIVITIES
page.content: {THE STABLES. } These are owned now by Mr.& Mrs.A.Muckslow,who have just taken over from the Harrison family who started the stables 5 years ago.It is called{"Four Acres Riding School"}but is also used as a small caravan site for club members.People come from all over to stay there and ride horses. There are about 32 horses or ponies for which people pay approximately Â£3 per hour.In the summer holiday periods many visitors,both adult and children, come for a riding holiday and stay in the bunk-house. The indoor school,which has sand all over the floor,is very good because when you fall off you won't hurt your self.It also helps to keep the lessons going in bad weather.Quite a few children from our school use "Four Acres" in their spare time.
